sentences.sContent: ...a major intellectual figure with disciples throughout Europe.
sentences.sCn: …一位信徒遍布欧洲的重要知识分子。

remMethod.val: 门徒 (disciple) 必须遵守纪律 (discipline)

words.tran: 门徒的身分，做门徒的时期

trans.tranCn: 信徒， 门徒； 追随者
trans.tranOther: someone who believes in the ideas of a great teacher or leader, especially a religious one
